text: Yara palanakartara adesa palana kare, tadera jan'ya uttama pratidana rayeche ebam yara adesa palana kare na, yadi tadera kache jagatera sabakichu thake ebam tara sathe tara samaparimana ara'o thake, tabe saba'i nijedera muktipana sbarupa diye debe. Tadera jan'ye rayeche kathora hisaba. Tadera abasa habe jahannama. Seta kata'ina nikrsta abasthana.
